remarks: Additive identity multiplied by a trace-preserving endomorphism. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-2013.)
statement:
tendoid0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
tendoid0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendoid0.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoid0.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoid0.o $e |- O = ( f e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
tendo0mul $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ U e. E ) -> ( O o. U ) = O ) $.
$d B f $.
$d T f $.
